sentences.en: An irrevocable L / C is not considered as " confirmed " unless it is expressly stated.
sentences.cn: 除非特别说明,不可撤消的信用证不能被当作 “ 保兑 ” 信用证.

sentences.en: For if he believed what he said, then his life was set on an irrevocable course.
sentences.cn: 因为如果他念念不忘他所说的话, 那他此去也就没命了,等于无可挽回地踏上了死路.

sentences.en: He had decided, and it was irrevocable.
sentences.cn: 他决心已定, 驷马难追.

sentences.en: He said the decision was irrevocable.
sentences.cn: 他说这项决定是不可改变的。

sentences.en: His life was set on an irrevocable course.
sentences.cn: 他的生活道路不可改变.

sentences.en: If a credit is opened without the word " irrevocable ", it can be considered revocable.
sentences.cn: 凡证上未注明 “ 不可撤消 ” 字样的, 都被认为是可以撤消的信用证.

sentences.en: It may well be worth waiting for better times before making any irrevocable commitment.
sentences.cn: 最好等到更合适的时候再作出不能反悔的承诺。

sentences.en: No, our parting is final and irrevocable.
sentences.cn: 不, 我们的分开是决定性的,不可挽回的!

sentences.en: She went out and with irrevocable finality, slammed the door of her doll house Behind her.
sentences.cn: 她走出了房子,毫不犹豫地 、 决然地砰地一声关上了玩偶之家的大门.

sentences.en: The bank has made out an irrevocable letter of credit.
sentences.cn: 银行开出了不可撤销的信用证[状].

sentences.en: The condition imposed by the Fates had been met , and the decree was irrevocable.
sentences.cn: 命运女神提出的条件有人承认了, 这笔天命交易也就拍板定案.

sentences.en: The doom which I have passed upon her is irrevocable.
sentences.cn: 我对她下的判决是不能挽回的.

sentences.en: Think about the situation carefully before you take an irrevocable step.
sentences.cn: 在你踏出不能回头的一步之前要三思。

sentences.en: We insisted on payment by a confirmed, irrevocable letter of credit.
sentences.cn: 我们用保兑的, 不可撤消的信用证为付款条件.

sentences.en: We usually accept payment by irrevocable L C payable against shiping documents.
sentences.cn: 我们一般用不可撤销信用证,凭装运单据结汇付款方式.

sentences.en: What is marriage? An irrevocable vow.
sentences.cn: 婚姻是什么 呢 ?是不能取消的誓言.

words.tran_cn: 不可逆的；不能取消的；不能翻转的
不能取消地；不能撤回地
不可改变的；不能取消的；不能挽回的

trans.tran_cn: 不能取消的，不可改变的，不能挽回的
trans.tran_en: an irrevocable decision, action etc cannot be changed or stopped
